Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Six braids of hair
Description: This is a set of six braids of light chestnut-brown hair. All the braids are all rather thin and are braided relatively tightly. They were originally cut at the tapping of the scalp. There are intact and all, except one, end in a near -90° angle.
